publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

sourceDesc.p: Work of the literatures of Ethiopia and Eritrea

profileDesc.creation: The date post quem of the Arabic version () is provided by the death of patriarch , the date ante quem by a synodal letter from 1079 which is not included.
According to the work must have been translated to Ethiopic before 1577.

relation.name: saws:isAttributedToAuthor
relation.desc:
198 has attributed the translation to , but according to
1074 no evidence for this has been found in the manuscripts.

relation.name: saws:follows
relation.desc: The Maṣḥafa ṭomār very often follows Hāymānota ʾabaw and precedes the table of content.

relation.name: saws:follows
relation.desc: The Tǝmhǝrta ḫǝbuʾāt can be included at the beginning of the Hāymānota ʾabaw, following the introduction.

Maṣḥafa ṭomār
div.desc: The Maṣḥafa ṭomār circulates also independently and is not present in all manuscripts containing the Hāymānota ʾabaw. It can also follow the table of contents.
